description:
In this course you will learn nuts and bolts of using WordPress to create a blog, website and an online shop/store.

The course is updated for Version 3.6 of WordPress.

The course is video based and comprises of 45 modules. The course will take about five (05) hours to complete.

This course includes topics which cover essentials as well as advance aspects. You will also learn to use and customize the Canvas Theme developed by Woothemes. I have chosen this theme because this is perhaps the most comprehensive, flexible and user friendly theme currently available.

In this course you will also learn to use the Woocommerce Plugin to create an online store/shop.

You should take this course because the course is comprehensive and teaches you to create a blog, website and an online shop in a simple and easy manner.
title: WordPress + Canvas Theme + Woocommerce Nuts and Bolts
